casebody.data:
James S. COHEN, AS TRUSTEE OF the ROBERT B. COHEN LIVING TRUST, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
Samantha O. PERELMAN, Defendant-Respondent. In the Matter of the Estate of Robert B. Cohen, Deceased. James S. Cohen, as Trustee of the Robert B. Cohen Living Trust, Plaintiff,
v.
Samantha O. Perelman, Defendant. In the Matter of the Estate of Robert B. Cohen, Deceased. (Estate of Robert B. Cohen - Petitioner) C-704 September Term 2018
082233 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 21, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-3275/3286-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
